Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Maybe we could look https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-13590 as part of this too?

Action.author: mbwhite
Action.body: FYI - added a post to fabric-maintainers to see thoughts on if this needs an RFC or not for the new repo to be created?

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Yep I had left this with ~awjh-ibm to discuss with maintainers. I don't think we'll need an RFC, but we'll hope to hear back from them soon

Action.author: awjh-ibm
Action.body: Discussion has pointed to this being a part of the fabric-test repo. All work shall therefore be put into there
